description: Managed and maintained the school's website, ensuring content was always up-to-date and relevant. Collaborated with various departments to gather and publish the latest information. Implemented new features per the school's needs. Ensured website security from cyber threats.

Designing and building the website structure to ensure clear navigation and user flow. Creating user interface (UI) designs focusing on usability and aesthetics. Implementing UI designs into a WordPress platform using Elementor, ensuring responsive and functional layouts.

Designing and building website structures to ensure clear navigation and intuitive user flow. Creating user interface (UI) designs that emphasize simplicity and informativeness. My focus was on delivering a clean layout that effectively communicated content while maintaining userfriendliness and  visual appeal. Implementing UI designs into Berdu, ensuring responsive and functional layouts that worked seamlessly across various devices

Creating user interface (UI) designs tailored to client needs, focusing on usability, aesthetics, and delivering a visually appealing yet functional experience. Implementing the approved UI designs into a WordPress platform using Elementor, ensuring the final product was responsive, aligned with client expectations, and optimized for various devices
